result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Roger D. Goodwin Jr.

records.addlTxt: Atty Donald Biekskis is appointed as Advocate Counsel.

9:15 AM 
Defendant Roger D. Goodwin Jr. in court, in custody. 
Attorney Rosa Delgado in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court Reporter:  Kimberly Keel.  Clerk:  JM.
MINUTES:
Victim rights compliance. 
Defendant is on a PO hold.
Court appoints the defendant advocate counsel.
Matter set over, bond continued.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 9, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.  No contact including the residence, electronic or 3rd party with: Veronica C, Karen G.   The DE may make arrangements with a party or law enforcement to retrieve personal property and/or medication from the victim K.G.'s residence within 24 hours of signing the bond in this case.  The DE may not be the party retrieving any property and/or medication.

02:107 PM   State appears by Attorney Alexander Huber.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Seth Johnson.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  The Court finds probable cause in this case today.  Plea of Not Guilty entered.   Defendant is on a PO Hold. Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 30, 2022 at 01:45 pm.  Final pre-trial scheduled for October 18, 2022 at 09:15 am. $1000  Signature Bond Set w/conditions (see bond event).  sg
and witness list filed by the State
